constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA Name: Cadogan Road Conservation Area
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Replacement of  existing white painted timber, front bay windows at ground and first floor levels with new UPVC Residence 9 Type white windows designed to authentically replicate 19th Century timber window designs
decision_conditions: The proposed replacement of existing white painted timber, front bay windows at ground and first floor levels with new UPVC Residence 9 Type white windows designed to authentically replicate 19th Century timber window designs falls within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The site address in the application form is '14B and 14C Lovelace Road, KT6 6NJ', where as the site address in the previous application is '14B and 14C Lovelace Road,Surbiton, KT6 6NJ'. Please amend the whole application form with correct site address.

There is no statutory definition of 'non-material'. This is because it will be dependent on the context of the overall scheme - an amendment that is non-material in one context may be material in another. The local planning authority must be satisfied that the amendment sought is non-material in order to grant an application under section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
